item.title: Startup Embodied Will Brick $800 Moxie Emotional Support Robot for Kids—Without Refunds
item.description: Embodied says it will try to refund recent purchases of its Moxie robot but makes no promises.

item.title: Humans Will Continue to Live in an Age of Incredible Food Waste
item.description: Food production has never been higher—or more costly. Yet the amount that goes uneaten remains shockingly high.

item.title: OnlyFans Models Are Using AI Impersonators to Keep Up With Their DMs
item.description: AI is replacing the humans who pretend to be OnlyFans stars in online amorous messages.
